channel.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal
channel.description:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Does anyone know how to fix this? If so please post!! Thanks! ;D

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Put in your path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin; It should work, or try google it.

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal

item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Set your path correctly in your environmental variables.
Start > My Computer > Right Click > Properties > Advanced > Environmental Variables.

New Variable:
Variable Name - PATH
Variable Value - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin

Okay > Try to run.

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal
